name: Yōkai Map
description:
A 2D top-down experience of Japan illustrating its regions and prefectures in an easy to use geographical interactive experience. Locate and learn about the Yōkai of Japan with the Yōkai Map. On it can be found Yōkai, the regions and prefectures of Japan along with their flags.

More Yōkai and additional features to be added. This project also forms the basis of a more complex Grand Strategy game. The project has been created for 'Fun a Day Dundee 2020' https://creativedundee.com/2019/12/fun-a-day-dundee-2020/
